title: Fundamentals of Theater Production
description: Work is on various aspects of theatrical production, including scenery, lighting, costumes, sound, stage management, and video documentation. Satisfies the department's technical experience requirement. May be repeated for credit.
class_notes: Mandatory first class meeting on Wednesday, October 4th 9:00 - 10:00 AM in the Theater Arts Mainstage. The enrollment process is described in the department undergraduate handbook here: https://tinyurl.com/THEA50. Contacttheater-ugradadv@ucsc.eduwith questions.
